title: [Large-scale] Multimedia Learning Optimization Design for Advanced Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical science knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Project-based scientific problem-solving for medical settings, emphasizing learner self-directed environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more cognitive load management strategies when designing the sequence of multimedia materials
Learners improve their ability to filter core vs. non-core information to 85% accuracy or higher in situations of reduced self-regulation
Learners improve transfer learning outcomes by 20% or more in project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
